sumsub.com.businessModelAndPrices: Sumsub offers two pricing plans: 'Growing' and 'Enterprise'. The 'Growing' plan is for businesses with more than 1000 verifications per month. The 'Enterprise' plan offers a custom price and includes features like custom integration, personal customer success manager, single sign-on, priority support via chat, white labeling, reusable KYC, and API integration. The exact prices are not listed on the website.
sumsub.com.summary: Sumsub is a KYC provider that offers user and business verification, as well as transaction monitoring. It supports over 14,000 document types from more than 220 countries and territories. Sumsub also provides a flexible workflow builder for creating unique verification flows and automating the decision-making process. It offers two pricing plans: 'Growing' and 'Enterprise', with the latter offering a custom price.

usecases: Customer and transaction screening and monitoring

Salv.summary: Salv is a RegTech company that offers AML software for banks and fintechs. Their Salv Platform provides real-time checks, configurable rules, and counterparty monitoring for AML and KYC compliance. They also offer risk scoring based on KYC data and transactional behavior.

Veriff.summary: Veriff offers AI-powered identity verification solutions with advanced facial recognition and assisted image capture technology. They focus on identity verification and fraud prevention.

Ondato.summary: Ondato provides an end-to-end KYC management system for customer onboarding, authentication, and customer data management. Their modular approach allows businesses to choose the modules that match their needs.

Quantexa.summary: Quantexa offers a contextual KYC platform that enables data-driven decision making and compliance optimization. Their platform provides a connected view of data to enhance risk identification and reduce time and cost in the KYC lifecycle.

Fullcircl.summary: Fullcircl offers an automated KYC and AML platform with customer lifecycle intelligence. Their platform automates KYC checks and provides data matching and enrichment for a contextualized view of data.

Jumio.summary: Jumio offers online identity proofing and eKYC solutions with enhanced identity checks. Their solutions help build trust with customers and prevent fraud.

They provide solutions for Know Your Customer (KYC) compliance, including their product CleverKYC. KYC is the aspect of due diligence that deals with the identity verification of customers. It involves checking personal and business details to exclude negative hits such as sanctions lists, watch lists, and politically exposed persons (PEP) lists. LexisNexis helps companies uncover hidden risks when working with third parties and provides tools for customer due diligence and risk and compliance checks. Know Your Customer serves clients globally and offers exceptional customer support.

They offer customizable pricing plans and claim to save up to 70% of identity verification costs.

beosin.com.business_model: Beosin is a leading global blockchain security company that provides an all-in-one blockchain security solution. They offer services such as smart contract audit, on-chain risk monitoring and alert, KYT AML, and crypto tracing. Beosin aims to secure the blockchain ecosystem by improving the security of smart contracts, identifying risk transactions, and providing security sentiment analysis. They also offer blockchain security audit services and cryptocurrency tracing to help clients prevent threats and track the flow of crypto assets. Beosin has audited over 3,000 smart contracts and serves global customers in various industries. However, specific information about their business model or pricing is not provided on the website.

www.vikartech.com.business_model: Vikar is a digital transformation software company that targets community banks and credit unions. They offer solutions for loan lifecycle management and client lifecycle management. Vikar's solutions aim to modernize and enhance the employee and client experience by providing end-to-end intelligent, scalable, and automated front-end user interfaces. They streamline operations and increase productivity by sitting on top of existing core back-end systems for seamless integration. Vikar's loan lifecycle management solution includes features such as borrower digital portal, loan origination, onboarding and servicing, and portfolio management. Their client lifecycle management solution includes features such as onboarding and KYC, account opening and funding, KYC reviews and maintenance, and BSA/AML fraud detection. However, specific information about their business model or pricing is not provided on the website.

complyadvantage.com.business_model: ComplyAdvantage is a leader in AI-driven fraud and AML risk detection. They offer solutions for sanctions and watchlists screening, adverse media screening, know your business (KYB), transaction monitoring, fraud detection, and payment screening. ComplyAdvantage aims to improve compliance workload efficiency, reduce false positives by 70%, and shorten onboarding cycle time by 50%. They provide configurable solutions that can quickly adjust to changes in financial crime risk appetite at the bank or regulation. ComplyAdvantage has empowered over 1000 leading companies to make compliance painless. They offer free tools and resources such as ComplyTry and ComplyLaunch™. However, specific information about their business model or pricing is not provided on the website.

selfkey.org.business_model: SelfKey is a decentralized self-sovereign identity network that aims to empower individuals and corporations to take back ownership of their identity data. They offer a secure wallet for KYC data and other assets, allowing users to securely store and manage their digital identity, KYC documents, and other digital assets including NFTs. SelfKey also provides access to a marketplace where users can access a broad range of services and build an empire in the real world. The SelfKey Identity Wallet is free and operates locally, ensuring data security. However, specific information about their business model or pricing is not provided on the website.

truststamp.ai.business_model: Trust Stamp is a company that delivers trusted identity systems at the heart of how organizations and individuals transact in the connected world. They focus on creating identity, powering transactions that enfranchise all parties involved, and mitigating risk to identity data. Trust Stamp offers a full suite of identity tools, including privacy and data protection, biometric multi-factor authentication, document validation, identity verification, duplicate detection, biometric capture, geolocation, crypto security and compliance, and trusted messaging. They cater to various industries such as banking and fintech, cryptocurrency and digital assets, government services, KYC/AML compliance, biometrically secured email, real estate, and humanitarian services. Specific pricing information is not provided on the website, but interested parties are encouraged to get in touch for more details.

web.fractal.id.business_model: Fractal ID is a company that offers a vertically integrated identity stack for the web3 ecosystem. They provide solutions for dApps, blockchain ecosystems, and private & public sales. Fractal ID's identity stack is permissionless, open-source, multi-chain, and supports any DID-format. They offer tailored identity solutions for various use cases, such as DeFi, RWA, social platforms, DEX, launchpads, and more. Fractal ID's solutions focus on reusability and portability of verified identities, extended on-chain tooling, interoperability between ecosystems, a vertically integrated identity stack, time-tested experience, and full support. Specific pricing information is not provided on the website, but interested parties are encouraged to book a demo for more details.
